title: Bidja
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: Bidja's story of his amazing family and his love for the bush
description: Of Yorta Yorta descent, Bidja Atkinson talks about his love for the bush and his life living just outside of Echuca with his family of artists and musicians.
